name: Keep IT Alive (edgelord314)
description:
A simple reaction game where you have to **quickly choose ITs faith to keep it alive** made on the last day of the event within a few hours.
Made with Java and Salty Engine.

IMPORTANT: When the game only shows a white screen on windows, it may be because of the audio. Try the audio-less build instead please. The music and sound fx can be found here: https://github.com/edgelord314/KeepITAlive/tree/master/src/main/resources

Controls
left mouse button: click buttons (duh)
1 - 5: choose the sentence endings and therefore ITs faith
